text: Ernesto Antonio "Tito" Puente (April 20, 1923 â€“ June 1, 2000) was an American musician, songwriter and record producer. He was known as "The Musical Pope", "El Rey de los Timbales" (The King of the Timbales) and "The King of Latin Music". He is best known for his Latin jazz works. He and his music appear in many movies such as The Mambo Kings and Fernando Trueba's Calle 54. He guest- starred on several television shows, including Sesame Street and The Simpsons. His most famous song is "Oye Como Va". ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American jazz musicians Category:American songwriters Category:American drummers Category:American composers Category:American record producers Category:Musicians from New York City Category:Writers from New York City
title: Tito Puente
